message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start
Your 60-40 split seems a bit off, how about we meet closer to the middle? This offer is better for you in the long run.
I can do 58-42, it's as close to the middle as I'm willing to go
Alice, this is a really good deal for you.  The longer this goes on the less your share will be worth. Let's be reasonable and end this.
I'll meet you at 56-44, but that's as low as I'll go
This is ridiculous Alice, let's just split it evenly and call it a day. Any more rounds and you'll be losing serious money due to inflation.
